snippet: A new species of leopard frog, still unnamed, is known to exist only in the metropolitan area and was identified by its distinctive mating call and DNA testing.
abstract: Scientists confirm the identification of a new species of leopard frog in New York City and a number of surrounding counties; findings will be published in journal Molecular Phylogenetics and Evolution.
lead_paragraph: A new species of leopard frog, still unnamed, is known to exist only in the metropolitan area and was identified by its distinctive mating call and DNA testing.

headline.seo: New Leopard Frog Species Is Discovered in N.Y.C.
headline.main: A New Species in New York Was Croaking in Plain Sight
headline.print_headline: A New Species in New York Was Croaking in Plain Sight
